I like Titanic. Perfect for midnight chill.
It's a pretty ice choice.

Guess I'm the only one in here who was thinking the Millennium Falcon
Probably, but it IS a pretty good ship. She can do the Kessel Run in 12 parsecs.
I was thinking more along the lines of an X-Wing Starfighter. But I wasn't sure that counts.
Zac and Riven

What the fu-?
A man of culture, I see

The Morning Star?
It would have been the Dead Pool, but it was reduced to Bearded Lady's toothpicks a while ago, so yeah, the Morning Star.
Okay but does a half-fortress count as a ship? I mean, after all, if we can have spaceships, why can't we have halffortresships?

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K5ftfXLA,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-10-02T15:29:08.052+0000)
>
> The Morning Star?
> It would have been the Dead Pool, but it was reduced to Bearded Lady's toothpicks a while ago, so yeah, the Morning Star.

I know you personaly like garen x katarina,  but they are more like fighter competitors and comrade to me, what I don't like is how people twist them even in game play, I don't play this game much now because the community issue, but my friend who play this game said he get mysteriously disconnection from the game when he play garen vs katarina in the enemy team, and everytime the enemy teams have carrier, while his teams have feeders and afkers. That is not healthy meme. We just want normal comrade battle, so we can really enjoy the game.
Don't harrass rioters.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K5ftfXLA,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2019-10-03T17:42:30.503+0000)
>
> Don't harrass rioters.

"It's not happending", I hope rioter tell you in the face, your garen katarina ship is not happening. I will always remember how you treat my ship. I hope they tell you that your ship is not happening too.
Now if only they started giving an actual updated lore to Talon...
is not talon that guy who killed kavyn his buddy and dumped his corpse in a gutter?
Camille and zil? Talon braum? Tal ekko? Ezreal jayce? Am I missing something? I've never heard of these at all...

Since when do ships have to be canon to enjoy them...? Katarina and Garen weren't even ever confirmed a couple in the old lore, and in the new lore they have no relation whatsoever, but people still like that one.

The last two you listed are somewhat popular though.

Not necessarily romantic but a relationSHIP nonetheless, Garen/Taric. I'm so intrigued by their relationship. It went from friends to enemies to... what is it now? I'd love to know how a reunion would go post Taric becoming an aspect.

> [{quoted}](name=Lapis,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K5ftfXLA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-02T10:57:57.564+0000)
>
> Not necessarily romantic but a relationSHIP nonetheless, Garen/Taric. I'm so intrigued by their relationship. It went from friends to enemies to... what is it now? I'd love to know how a reunion would go post Taric becoming an aspect.

Don't say that, it's forbidden, and they will tell you :" It's not happending."

> [{quoted}](name=Hunkmenlordy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K5ftfXLA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-02T12:01:58.585+0000)
>
> Don't say that, it's forbidden, and they will tell you :" It's not happending."

Forbidden? Is there something i'm missing?

That guy is just salty because he exists to shitpost how "TaricXGaren is the best ship and Riot confirms" etc. And people call him out on it, especially since he has several accounts that he logs onto to upvote himself and agree with himself, even though there's no romantic connection between the two confirmed at all.

What you said was perfectly acceptable and won't be called out.
Inb4 {{champion:1}} x (anyone) jokes
Aint gonna lie {{champion:1}} ×{{champion:20}}  is a cute ship
You're trying to summon Xano, aren't you?

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainAntiHeroz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=K5ftfXLA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-02T10:58:04.702+0000)
>

Uhh...too soon?

I thought it was nice how she was totally cool with him crashing at her place after he was nearly killed and had an Aspect ripped from his body. 

I guess its not unprecedented that two people morning over the same person end up growing that close, but I always thought it was a little weird...maybe that's just me.
Oh jeeze, I started something here. My bad!

i am more of a classic guy.

{{champion:81}} x{{champion:44}}

Just going to list the ones I ship — canon (or almost canon) or not...

Pantheon x Leona (childhood best friends who trained together (I don’t know if they changed that in Pantheon’s new lore or not))

Ekko x Jinx (before Jinx went psycho)

Lulu x Veigar (she’s quite short with him)

Jhin x Jinx (both psycho marksmen, their love of killing for their own reasons)

Annie x Nunu (both kids and fire/ice)

Jhin x Karma (as someone else stated, they’re stark opposites with extreme passions from the same place)

Rumble x Tristana (I mean...Rumble’s mech is named Tristy. Come on.)

Rakan x Ahri (both charming, beautiful vastayans)

Taliyah x Yasuo (I love the connection they have. I don’t know what their ages actually are. I see them close enough in age in the lore, and I wish they were more...)

Sylas x Lux (for obvious reasons...Little Light)

{{sticker:sg-jinx}} 

Syndra x Zed (I can just see her saying Zeddy Booboo in an alternate universe)

Vayne x Vladimir (classic story of light falling for dark and vice versa)

Sejuani x Udyr (eeeeeeeeeeeeeee)

Lamb x Wolf (this one’s pretty obvious...they’re so beautiful together)

Kindred x Jhin (not a relationship ship, but despite what the lore says, I can’t help but feel that they’re one and the same)
